scripts.deploy: sh -c 'set -e; nuxt generate; rm -rf gh-pages; git fetch origin; git worktree add -B gh-pages gh-pages origin/gh-pages || git worktree add -B gh-pages gh-pages; find gh-pages -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 ! -name ".git" -exec rm -rf {} +; cp -R .output/public/* gh-pages/; touch gh-pages/.nojekyll; cd gh-pages; git add -A; git commit -m "Deploy $(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)" || echo "Nothing to commit"; git push origin gh-pages; cd ..; git worktree remove gh-pages --force'
